metadata.title: CVE-2021-3635 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in the Linux kernel netfilter implementation in versionsprior to 5.5-rc7. A user with root (CAP_SYS_ADMIN) access is able to panicthe system when issuing netfilter netflow commands.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3635` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-18-generic - 5.4.0-18.22
linux-image-5.4.0-18-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-18.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-18-generic - 5.4.0-18.22
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-18-lowlatency - 5.4.0-18.22
No subscription required

linux-image-5.8.0-23-generic - 5.8.0-23.24~20.04.1
